botsort_loose.name: BotSort-Loose
botsort_loose.description: BotSort with loose matching for crowded scenes

boosttrack_optimized.name: BoostTrack-Optimized
boosttrack_optimized.description: BoostTrack with optimized parameters for accuracy

parameter_descriptions.match_thresh: Threshold for matching tracks between frames (0.0-1.0). Higher = stricter matching
parameter_descriptions.track_thresh: Confidence threshold for creating new tracks (0.0-1.0)
parameter_descriptions.track_buffer: Number of frames to keep lost tracks before deletion
parameter_descriptions.half: Use half precision (FP16) for faster inference on GPU
parameter_descriptions.reid_weights: Path to ReID model weights file
parameter_descriptions.device: Device to run tracker on (e.g. cuda, cpu)
parameter_descriptions.det_thresh: Detection confidence threshold for considering detections (0.0-1.0)
parameter_descriptions.max_age: Maximum number of frames to keep track alive without matching
parameter_descriptions.min_hits: Minimum number of detections before track is initialized
parameter_descriptions.inertia: Motion model weight for position prediction (0.0-1.0)
parameter_descriptions.use_ecc: Whether to use ECC (Enhanced Correlation Coefficient) for motion estimation
parameter_descriptions.cmc_method: Camera Motion Compensation method (None, ECC, or Sparse)
parameter_descriptions.cmc_off: Whether to disable Camera Motion Compensation
parameter_descriptions.fuse_first_associate: Whether to fuse appearance and motion information in first association
parameter_descriptions.with_reid: Whether to use ReID features for tracking
